amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit taxpayer exposure by ensuring diversification of industries and companies at the Export-Import Bank.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 314 (Roll no. 612).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 314 (Roll no. 612).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
